scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: npm run install:user && npm run install:product && npm run install:order && npm run install:payment && npm run install:notification
scripts.build:all: npm run build:services && npm run build:client
scripts.build:services: npm run build:user && npm run build:product && npm run build:order && npm run build:payment && npm run build:notification
scripts.migration:run:all: npm run migration:run:user && npm run migration:run:product && npm run migration:run:order && npm run migration:run:payment && npm run migration:run:notification
scripts.migration:rollback:all: npm run migration:rollback:user && npm run migration:rollback:product && npm run migration:rollback:order && npm run migration:rollback:payment && npm run migration:rollback:notification
scripts.db:up: docker-compose up -d user-db product-db order-db payment-db notification-db
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:up && sleep 5 && npm run migration:run:all
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "user,product,order,payment,notification,client" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,white" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:product" "npm run dev:order" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently -n "user,product,order,payment,notification" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:product" "npm run dev:order" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:notification"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:services && npm run clean:client
scripts.clean:services: cd services/user-service && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../product-service && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../order-service && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../payment-service && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../notification-service && rm -rf node_modules dist
